ISSUE.TITLE: docs: the control-api.md link in the `health-check` document is invalid
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: # Improve Docs ## Please describe which part of docs should be improved or typo fixed In the Chinese document of `health-check`, the link of `control-api.md` is invalid. As follows: Clicking to browse occurs 404. ## Describe the solution you'd like Since there is no Chinese document of `control-api.md`, we need to link it to the English document: [https://github.com/apache/apisix/blob/master/doc/control-api.md ](https://github.com/apache/apisix/blob/master/doc/control-api.md)

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: fix: `make deps` should not require root. (#3500)
